level.heading: Reports.
level.text: The Committee shall submit to the Council reports on the status of the Fiscal Year 1996 budget initiatives each month or as requested by the Council.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-319.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-98
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-98, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-319.01.
